I use this app for work everyday, but every 2 out of 5 times it becomes unresponsive and crashes. And when making changes (like renaming, adding notes and checklists, or moving to another column) it doesn't sync properly; more often than not the app refuses to update the change, and I have to make the change again. Or, if I try to change it again it crashes. The only thing going for it is the nice interface and that we use the desktop version a lot, which is a lot better than Trello. Would be ace if it synced properly and didnt crash so often. A few features are missing, like being able to refresh, and filters.

I like this app a lot. The only reason that makes me give this app only one star is that the android app doesn't sync at all! The android app is also not stable because it crashes often. Please get the android app fixed!

The web version had been a favorite but I had abandon it due to the poor android app. This new app is MUCH improved. I would like to see notifications for tasks when they reach the due date/time. Also, a dark theme when in project view would be nice. I did have one freeze up, but I haven't been able to replicate it. This app may be my Trello replacement.
